General.Name: Vulcan Minerals Inc.
General.Description: Vulcan Minerals Inc., a precious and base metals exploration company, engages in the acquisition, evaluation, and exploration of mineral properties in Newfoundland and Labrador. It primarily explores for copper, gold, nickel, cobalt, salt, and gypsum deposits. The company owns interests in the Colchester/Springdale project located in north-central Newfoundland; and Red Cross Lake nickel/copper/cobalt/gold project in central Newfoundland, as well as mineral licenses covering a portion of the Bay St. George Basin in Western Newfoundland. Vulcan Minerals Inc. was incorporated in 1995 and is headquartered in St. John's, Canada.
General.Address: 333 Duckworth Street, Saint John's, NF, Canada, A1C 1G9
